attributes.additional_details: The Conservatives have time and time again shown us that they are inept at running the country. The country will not have elected who will be the next PM, so it is only fair that we as a nation get a chance to say who we think should be the next ruling party.
attributes.background: In light of all the Conservative party resignations, including the PM, the government needs to elect to hold and early election, as no one in the country will yet again have voted for who is leading the Conservative party.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Call for an early General Election for 2022
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033
